title: Designing Online Discussion Monitoring Strategies: A Systematic Literature Review-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Social sector competency enhancement program for practicing professionals. Conducts project-based assessments in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and analyze three types of interactions (collaborative, critical, creative) in online discussions
Learners can systematically classify discussion participation data using the Moderators' Assessment Matrix
Learners can apply a self-reflective process to autonomously design discussion facilitation strategies based on assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
